entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The group of men clambering down the slope are likely Death Eaters, as they are making heavy scuï¬„ing and scraping noises.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is estimating the distance of the approaching group to be fewer than twenty feet away.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione snatches up the beaded bag and starts to rummage for Extendable Ears.

entities.name: extendable ears
entities.description: Hermione draws out three Extendable Ears from the beaded bag.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: The enchantments cast around themselves are intended to shield them from the notice of Muggles.

entities.name: normal witches and wizards
entities.description: The enchantments cast around themselves are intended to shield them from the notice of normal witches and wizards.

relationships.description: Death Eaters are approaching Harry, who is waiting with his wand drawn.
Death Eaters are approaching Harry, who is waiting with his wand drawn and may be their target.
